snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [413] Thomas the Tank Engine and Friends
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

The game has multiple modes which including colouring in, exploring  racing and missions.  I just record a few random missions as there doesn't appear to be any particular amount needed to achieve anything.  I record the full race modes as well.  You can also colour in any of the supplied characters and those colour choices will be used in the game.  The game also has an interesting use of speech samples. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
